body.success: The address has been correctly associated with your account. All related settings can now be managed through the user interface.

error.challengeNotFound: The requested challenge could not be found. Please verify your link or repeat the claim process.
error.alreadyClaimed: This address is already linked to your account. You can select it directly from the dropdown in the top navigation bar.
error.limitReached: Address limit reached. Please remove an existing address before adding a new one.
error.somethingWrong: An error occurred while adding the address to your account. Please try again in a few seconds or contact the CIDgravity support team.
